    • create

      public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack create(org.bukkit.Material material, String name, String... lore)
      Create a basic button with name and lore
      Parameters:
      material - The material for the button
      name - The name of the button
      lore - The lore (description) of the button
      Returns:
      An ItemStack configured as a button

    • createTranslated

      public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack createTranslated(org.bukkit.Material material, String nameKey, String... loreKeys)
      Create a button with a translation key for the name and lore
      Parameters:
      material - The material for the button
      nameKey - The translation key for the button name
      loreKeys - The translation keys for the lore lines
      Returns:
      An ItemStack configured as a button with translated text
